text: Statement from President Joe Biden  —  Today, I signed a pardon for my son Hunter.  From the day I took office, I said I would not interfere with the Justice Department's decision-making, and I kept my word even as I have watched my son being selectively, and unfairly, prosecuted.

We haven't seen a pardon as sweeping as Hunter Biden's in generations  —  The “full and unconditional” pardon is aimed at protecting the president's son from future prosecution by the Trump Justice Department.  —  Hunter Biden's pardon looks a lot like Richard Nixon's.
